level1_headings.text: In consideration of your use of the Site, you agree to: (a) provide true, accurate, current and complete information about yourself as prompted by the Site's registration form (such information being the "Registration Data") and (b) maintain and promptly update the Registration Data to keep it true, accurate, current and complete. If you provide any information that is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, or 01webdirectory.com has reasonable grounds to suspect that such information is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, 01webdirectory.com has the right to suspend, terminate, or refuse any and all current or future use of the Site (or any portion thereof).

A refund of payment made to listing a website in 01webdirectory.com will be made under the following circumstances -
The site submitted for review is not accepted and/or listed by the editors of 01webdirectory.com.

The site is accepted but not listed to the satisfaction of the site owner. We do our best to resolve any issues related to your site submission at 01webdirectory.com. However, if the site owner is not satisfied for any reason and wants to cancel the listing, should request for a refund within 30 days of listing the website. A cancellation of the listing after 30 days from the day of listng will not obligate 01webdirectory.com to refund any of the fees. Refund will not be made under any circumstances not mentioned above.
